“ema nisa budun deshana kala me wishwaye arambaaya chakkakari bawath me wishwaya anantha bawath.ithin meya sewimen obata palak nowanneda eya sewimen walaki appamadawa katayuthu karamin sasaren goda wenna kiya.”
ewan sithaka balayata athi aashawa ho jiwithaya windimata athi aashawa ropanaya nowannemaya.
ee hinda godak aya purudu wuna ee nama wenuwata anju kiyala katha karanna.

rate nithiya ha samaya ballata yanawa eeke nan dekak na.”

“mahaneni, yam se digin, palalin ha usin yodunak (sathapum 16k) bagin eka samana wu ghana maha kalugal parwathayak weda, ema kalugal parwathaya awurudu siyayakata wathawak itha sinidu kasisaluwakin pirimadima nisa itha dirgha kalayak awamen me maha parwathaya sampurnayen gewi awasan wi ya hakiyi.
palana anshaya (palana / manawa sampath / thorathuru thakshana)
umbaala ali hinda windina duka nan ananthayi.

namuth mema siduwimen pasuwa buddhi ansha pahala niladharin thula dadi wirodhayak ella wemin pawathina bawa buddhi anshaye ihala niladharin kihipa denekma gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathata pawasa thibena bawada wartha we.
kawitikata thanuwak dala gayana karannath puluwan.
ema tharagaya nisa parlimenthuwe karaka sabha awasthawedi bedumwadi sanshodhana athulu kirime kuta kriyawaliyata wadi idak labe.
ane api awurudu 5tama igena gaththe nane pirimi ayatath garbhasha thiyanawa kiyala

madhya maha widyalawala newasikagara gasthu piyawimata shishyathwa kramayak shishyayan wenuwen 1943 di kannangara wisin athi kaleya.ohuge wasara 16 ka adhyapana amathiwaraya lesa kala sewa kalayedi kolambaa wishwawidyalaya sthapitha kirimatath purathana piriwen wadidiyunu kirimatath ohuta hakiwiya.
eeta wenaswa apita kiyanna puluwan "labhaya sandaha nowa awashyathawaya sandaha nishpadanaya" kaloth parisaraya surakshitha wenawayayi kiyala.
thama pamanak nowa me rate boho dena gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathata puduma bayak thiyenna bawa amathiwaraya pawasayi.
aththatama mama nan ee kathawata wiruddhayi.
ee wenuwen kramaweda sakasuweya.

me atharathura fathimage daruwan siw dena siya mawa daka ganime risiyen wedanawata pathwa athi bawath mita riswange sahodarayagen ha birindagen sahaya pathuwa da owun eya prathikshepa kala bawath fathima pawasa atha.
meken wela thibena barapathalama haniya thamayi, widesha winimaya mankollakamwalata, dushanayata, hora jawaramwalata, mudal wishuddhikaranayata dorawal wiwrutha karala eya nithiyak bawata pathkirima.

shariraya namathi loka swabhawaya pilibandawa ketiyen namuth kala deshanawa saththan yanuwenda, upama upameya sambandhaya sabyanyjanan yanuwenda dharmaya awabodhayata awashya pramanayata awashya pamanin kala deshanawa kewala paripunnan yanuwenda labana lada uthum sothapanna ha arahath palayan shreshta brahmacharyawa washayenda dharmayehi ena swakkhatha gunayata ayath lakshana sathata manawa galapa ganimen pahadili wanu atha.
adhyapana prakashana departhamenthuwe salasum anshaye sewawan
ganikawan athadanguwata ganimen anathuruwa ee ayawa kantha niladharin magin pariksha kirima samanyayen siduwannaki.

adam strom: wenisiyulawe hitapu pa්rajathantha්rawadiwa thora path karagath janadhipathi wu hiyugo chawes ‘21 kwana siyawasa sandaha samaja wadaya’ yayi namkaranalada kriya margayak uda tharaga kota yali yalith jayaga්rahanaya kala bawa supa්rasiddha ya.

wathu palu karanawa...
umbaa thama danne nathi tharam balawath.
ranil wikramasinhage nayakathwayata wiruddha wana pirise mathaya wi aththe sinhala bauddha chanda dayakaya aakarshanaya kara gatha haki nayakayaku ejapayata awashya bawaya.
mata me langadi ahu una pannipitiye dharmapale guruwariyak liyapu pothak...

pasugami mlechcha kalakanni amana thakathiruwan pirisak eeta udalla damathi.
ithin math pan unath sharirayata hondayi kiyala bona kattiya innawa nam gon wadak karanne.
pin wada karanne gunothththara shreniyakin wage neda?

wisheshayenma shanthi niwasa naya kramaya sambandhayen sitina banku niladharin hamuwu wita owun obata adala naya illum kirima sandaha sapayiya yuthu lipi lekhanayan ha sahathika sambandhawa, anugamanaya kala yuthu piyawara sambandhawa menma naya gewimedi salakilimath wiya yuthu karunu, naya labaganimen anathuruwa siya mulya kalamanakarana katayuthu sidukaragatha yuthu aakaraya yanadi boho karunu karana sambandhayen nirawadya ha pahadili upades sapaya denu atha.
api digin digatama me aanduwalata balapam kala jathiwadi prawanathawayan athiwima walakwimata kirayamarga ganna lesa.

as deken pillakin wage kandulu galaddi tiwi ekath wahala layit ekath oof karan man adata watuna.
yuda hamuda mulasthanayen anumathiya lath aya pamanayi mage senankayata sambandha wuye.

deshapalana aarambhakathwaya gannawa wenuwata bijin kamkaruwange swadhina sammelanaya kale, komiyunist paksha nayakathwaya wisin sahana pirinamanu athayi yana maranthika mithyawa thorombal kala shishya wyaparaye sulu dhaneshwara "pa්rajathantha්rawadin” pitupasa badagama ya.
rawula ful shew karala.
ema (githayak kiya hithana eke) ka..
wyawastha sampadanaya pilibanda parlimenthu kriyawaliya mahajanathawata paradrushyabhawayen thorawu athara eya prajathanthrikada nowu bawada prakasha wi thibe.
owun balawath wana andamin madhyama panthiya ha ee panthiyata mahajana mudal sura dena se rajaya shakthimath kale apa ya.
esema anunta dimata tharam salliya bage nathath gedara thibena wihal tika, gahe hadena kos del gediya ho duppath asarana minissun wenuwen dima ekala gammunge siritha wiya.
me siyalu dena le nayan wu bawa sadahan we.
ohu ekawarama sandamali wetha kada panne natha.
mithuna, thula, makara, kumbha lagnawalata pina pade sikuru grahalowa subaya.
mahawali wasiyo maha pare
kiyawala madi wage nam mekath kiyawanna….ayisis karanne amerikawata oona de thamayi…..
mata denna sini wadi,
dannawada, eda ra umbaalath ekka set wenakota ape amma gedra putha balagen thaniyema hitiye.
kochchara modaya wunath, pabilis mewa gana eka kela bidak haluwe na.

ma me idiripath kara athi aakarayatama sinhala bhashawa/ sanskruthiya kannada ha malayalam bhasha/sanskruthingen poshanaya laba athi aakaraya sadhaka sahithawa peramune rala wisin idiripath karawi kiya balaporoththu wenawa.
pahugiya nowambare liyumak aawa.

"manik wyaparika pawasana paridi samange awasan mohothe ekama aramuna wi thibenne thamange mawa balimath ee naya gewimath yana karana deka...ithin oonama pudgalayek miya yana wita thama manase thibena de ohuge aathmayen itukaraganna balanawa...ithin me karanedi unath sidu wi thibenne eyayi...."
obawa sadarayen piligannawa mage punchi blog ekata.
ee pilibadawa dan awadhanaya yomu kalenam, “numbaala katha kalenam yahapath da katha karanna.

mehidi mudal prathilabha pilibada wadi awadhanayak yomu kala bawin owun wishwasa karana ladde sewakayan athireka mudalak upaya ganimata owun kalamanakarana niyoga pilipadina bawath, wada kirimata pelambaena bawathya.
ee wenakota, wata dekema nasthi wuna mulu welawa payak withara wuna.
me pramanaya malwathu oyata labena jalayen siyayata 75k pamana wana bawa warimarga departhamenthuwa pawasayi.
heda ha gabada kala kotta: garbhani saha hediyan sandaha prathikarayak!
mita passe wath kenekuta katha karanna igena ganna.
kohomada manussayek echchara wela nidaganne?

rathawahana nithiyata patahaniwa thriroda rathayaka wadipura magin gena yama pilibandawa thriroda ratha riyaduruta erehiwa mathale mahesthrath adhikaranaye nadu pawarimata polisiya piyawara gena atha.
ma danna paridi nam, pupurana drawya purawagath loriyak minis ghathanaya sandaha
punchi punchi sundara sihinawala sarisarana jiwithe aramuna.
aarthikaye prashna, janathawata balapana badu bara aadi karana gana gotabhaya siya pulul awadhanaya yomukara wigraha karanu daknata labina.
godak aya kiyanne kridakayek me widiyata prasiddhiye ashobhana lesa hasirena eka waradiyi kiyala.
"subha gaman mesiyar.."
ee anuwa mohu hondin danna handunana ayakugen thorathuru wimasuwaya.
dawasak tabu mata kiwwa deyak thamayi man karanna oona pansal kathawa liyana ekayi kiyala..anith dewal liyanna neweyi mage blog aagamanayen wenna oona kiyala...

siyalu lo sathun dukin mudawanu was sakwithi sapa harada buddha margaya soyagos siyalu badhaka mada budubawa labu budurajanan wahansege guna samudaya ekkota eya me yayi kiyannata siyum katayam, aadiyen galwaduwaku kala wishmitha nirmanayaki.galwaduwan kihipadenaku siyum gal katuwalin mitiwalin nangana shabdayata mama deneth hara balami.
namuth, me tankiya pihituwa aththe thiras athata nisa, ehi athi thel pramanaye hadaya samawitama tankiya kopamana hiswa athi da yana minumata anuwa wenas wenne sarala rekhiyawa nowe.
anura wirasinha, priyantha soyisa, krishantha da silwa, hemal mendis saha indrani aberathna me pirisayi.
eheth rajaya mula di thiranaya kale eeniya piligath parikshanagarawala daththa niwaradi wiya yuthu bawa ya.
mage karumeta ma malata nandata ehema ahithak karanna mama kamathi na.
janapathige niyamayen ema purappadu sankhyawama bandawaganima sandaha prathipadana da wen keruna athara, amathya mandalaye anumathiyada eeta labina.
mama ekama de wiwida krama walin kiyanawa mona kramekin hari therewi kiyala.
unwahanseta ikman suwaya prarthana karami.!
mata umbaalata kiyanna oona kiyala hithe thiyagena hitiyath amathaka wunaa..."
oona weyida kiya denna?
dan thamayi me mantaleta mitar wenne.

me bawa prakasha kara aththe dakunu koriyawe sol nuwara pawathi puwathpath sakachchawak atharathuradiya.”samaya, saubhagyaya saha ekamuthubawa sandaha wana panmunjom prakashaya” lesa giwisuma namkirimata niyamithaya.

oba pranshaye pawathwagena yana rangayathanaye wadakatayuthu kohomada ?
balapan umbaa kiwwa sasthare wada kara.
ese nowanne nam kayika ha manasika washayen wishala parihaniyakata hethu we.
kalinawa itha watina lipiyak.

indiyanu sinama aadhipathyayata yatawa ehi awajathaka daruwaku bawata merata sinama pathwa thibu yugayaka sinama ranganaya sinhala sinamawata uchitha aakarayata godananwimehila purogami meheyak itu kala kenek widiyata awiwadayen yuthuwa gamini ayiyawa handunwa denna puluwan.
“bos sigarat gaththe nadda?
ee ana­thuru sangnyawa kana wakethma walas mawa ugu­ren keti handak nanwa­min punchi wun thaman langata anda gaha gena udu sulanga iwa karanna wuna.
matada pitupasata yannata aaradhana kalada ma nidimatha bawak dathin penwa maga harimi.
hondin athinam meda…
matath dan nam penanema ee wage thamayi.
poda wassath anduru walawath sitha sulangath samanga me sundara bhumiyata piwisi nisado..............
mema tharagayedi wirat koli siya ekdina diwiye lakunu 8000 sampurna karagaththe warthawak da samagini.
kalifoniya pasadenahi nasa aayathanaye jet pa්rachalana rasayanagaraye alis le gal pa්ramukha pirisak thamayi, me kasini yanaya ewu daththa wishleshanaya karamin sitinne.
eeta pilithuru dimata nogiya ohu sakkuwen lensuwa gena dadiyen pengi thibu muhuna pisadama gaththeya.
ara eka nayakathumek ingirisiyen hithala sinhalen wakkiya thanala katha koranta yana eke anika oya...
ohu samaga payak gatha kirimen pasu athi wenasa amathaka kala nohakiya.
ohuta ee nidahasa laba diya yuthuyi kiyala.

''me okkoma the wawwe suddo, ee golla sinhala minissunge idam gaththa, pati mahaththaya thamayi me serama bala gaththe, (chaya rupaye diswana sudu jathika pawula balanna* dathaniyagala kanda penwu aya, ee kale sudu mahaththuru kiwwa oya kanda athulen polowe diya allak galanawa kiyala, ada oya wela thiyenne e්wa thamayi,” (gewal rasak naya yame tharjanayata lakwa athi ayuru mata mulinma dana ganimata haki wiya* jana pa්rawadawala ena karunak mata sihi path wuye, ”me kanda namunukula tharamatama usa thibuna dan path welayi thiyenne, me polowa yata gangawak thiyenawa kiyala thamayi, sudu injineru mahaththuru kiwwe, dan eeka siddhawela gewal gananawak yata gihin, namunukula kandu pamula bangalawa haduwe pati mahaththaya thamayi, the wathu haduwa, issara mewaye hitapu suddo assaya udin thamayi enne.‘‘ee kale mathaka kawi mathakkaloth, mama agen kihipa witakma illim kala pasu madak nihandawa sita,”

nirushi wimalawirasha්ri lankawe palath marga sanwardhanaya sandaha rupiyal koti 2500ka mudalak laba dimata loka bankuwa ha aasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwa ekangathwaya pala kara thibe.palath marga sanwardhanaya sandaha me sa mudalak ekawara waya kerenuye ithihasaye pa්rathama warata bawath mahamarga sanwardhana amathi ti.bi.eekanayaka mahatha pawasayi.loka bankuwa me pamana wishala mudalak labadimata sudanam wanuye sha්ri sanwardhanaya ha aarthika abhiwruddhiya wenuwen janadhipathithuma wisin gena yanu labana wadapiliwela kerehi dadi wishwasaya pala karamin bawath sandahan weyi.mese labadimata yana koti 2500 n koti 1500k loka bankuwen da ithiri koti 1000ka mudala aasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwen labimata niyamithaya.me yatathe sama mathiwarana kottasayakama nawa marga thuna bagin sanwardhanaya karena athara danata pawathina thawath marga gananawak konki්rat yoda sakas kirimatath niyamithaya.rekhiya amathyanshaya wisin mudal yoda idikarena me marga siyallama adala palath sabhawan wetha pawarenu atha.

rate agramathyawaraya lesa ewani prakopakari, aparinatha hasirimak balaporoththu nowana bawa owun siya niwedanayen prakasha kara atha.pasugiya dinawala sidu wu atham siduwim sambandhayen nithimaya kriyamarga gatha yuthuwa thibiyadi agramathyawaraya parlimenthuwe sidu kala prakashaya ithamath kanagatudayaka bawayi.pasugiya kalaya sidu wu maha parimana dushana akramikatha, athurudan kirim, manushya ghathana sambandhayen sidu karana wimarshanawalata badha wana lesa hasirimata patan gena sitina bodu balasenawa saha anekuth pudgalayin saha kandayam yati aramuna gana sanwediwa katayuthu kirima janamadhyawala wagakimak bawa ema wyaparaya penwa di atha.
